articles.author: Paul Sawers
articles.title: IBM to acquire StreamSets and WebMethods from Software AG for $2.3B - TechCrunch
articles.description: IBM is doling out €2.13 billion to acquire a duo of data integration assets from Germany-based enterprise software company Software AG.
articles.content:
IBM is doling out 2.13 billion ($2.3 billion) to acquire a duo of data integration assets from Germany-based enterprise software company Software AG.
